title: “#ReleaseThePod” (LIVE from LA’s Dolby Theater)
description: House Republicans give America its dumbest conspiracy yet. Jimmy Kimmel, John Legend, and Chrissy Teigen join Jon, Jon, Tommy, Dan, and Erin for a night of politics, games, and musical performances at the Dolby Theater in Los Angeles.
author: hey@crooked.com (Crooked Media)
